title: How to Make Mushroom Muffins

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 200 degrees Celsius.
Spray a muffin tray with non-stick greasing spray or brush with oil.
Whisk the egg, milk, and oil in a medium-sized bowl.
In a separate bowl, combine the flour, cheese, basil, and mushrooms.
Form a well in the dry ingredients and pour the wet ingredients.
Mix with a wooden spoon until the muffin batter is well-combined and lumpy.
Scoop the muffin batter into the muffin tray.
Place a couple pieces of the extra diced mushrooms in each muffin case.
Bake the muffins for about 20-25 minutes until golden brown.
Allow the muffins to cool off on a wire rack.
Serve.
steps.description: Place the mushrooms on a serving plate. Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top if desired. Enjoy!

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Spray a muffin tray with non-stick greasing spray or brush with oil. Whisk the egg, milk, and oil in a medium-sized bowl. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, cheese, basil, and mushrooms. Form a well in the dry ingredients and pour the wet ingredients. Mix with a wooden spoon until the muffin batter is well-combined and lumpy. Scoop the muffin batter into the muffin tray. Place a couple pieces of the extra diced mushrooms in each muffin case. Bake the muffins for about 20-25 minutes until golden brown. Allow the muffins to cool off on a wire rack. Serve. Place the mushrooms on a serving plate. Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top if desired. Enjoy!
